Contribute

Hi, I am Antonio

I created NUXPRESSO as an open source project, so I really think that any contribute to improve the funcionalities and extend the concepts around the original idea is welcome.


I am working on this personal project since last 4 months and I realized since the beginning that it will be always a work-in-progress one.


More job to be done


At the moment the code is not optimzed (maybe could look like spaghetti code, you know I am Italian so I understand ...) and still many work has to be done, like create a complete and useful documentation, improve the code and the UI, extend functionalities that are waiting an acceptable solution, set a complete test environment in order to deliver a stable and reliable solution.


For this reasons all contributions are welcome and I'd like to work on this project with a sort of team that believes in it.


Goals


The initial idea was to create a solution to improve the creative experience and reduce the time to build websites based on Headless CMS like Strapi.

At the same time I defined some requirements that the project needs to satisfy:

  • extendible and open to customization
  • portability (import/export)
  • unique design support
  • standard coding
  • modular


Roadmap


Next big step other then the above mentioned is to integrate an e-commerce support with a storefront designer integrated in MOKAStudio.



For all these reasons your contribute will be very welcome. I am always available to release any further information, technical and not, or just exchange your impressions and thoughts.


Thank you

Antonio
